name: Lost Feather
description:
Little duckling Duckie has lost his family in a storm. After waking up from being knocked out he found himself lost all alone in a forest. Help him find his mother and as many siblings as you can - he has 16 unique siblings. 

Since Duckie is the youngest duckling in his family, he cannot fly at all. Collect feathers to evolve his flying abilities and continue the journey.

Thank you for visiting this Page and have fun!

All sounds used from Epidemic Sound
